ygData.subject: EQ Screen freeze
ygData.msgSnippet: Since the sov patch, my EQ screen can freeze unpectedly all of a sudden. This is not the normal LD, where I will get the disconnected msg and get kicked back
ygData.messageBody:
Since the sov patch, my EQ screen can freeze unpectedly all of a sudden.
This is not the normal LD, where I will get the disconnected msg and get
kicked back to the EQ login screen. Instead, the PC just freeze and I have
to reboot the PC (ie auto scandisk etc) and restart EQ. Sometime the PC
automatically restart by itself just b4 I get to Win98 desktop.

Some other SCV cable modem users are also facing the same problem (eg
Merns, Trifrost) while some didn't (eg Leshrec). This problem can occurs
several times a night, or none at all. On average I will have 2-3
occurance every night. Surprisingly sometime I got no freezing on
weekends, when the server is very crowded.

I think this is related to some configurations (eg DataRate file) as well
as SCV modem. I just wanna check with those EQ SCV users, what is your
datarate setting (5.0 to 9.0)? Anyone else got the same problem? If yes,
did you manage to solve this, thx!

Ziltus (AdV), Innoruuk.
